Game.Name: Pocket Monsters - FireRed (Japan)
Game.plot: Pokémon Fire Red adds more content and features to one of the first Pokémon games ever released. In this version of the classic role-playing game, you can collect all of the monsters from different Pokémon installments, including Ruby, Sapphire, and Colosseum. The game comes with a wireless adapter, which lets you connect with your friends' Game Boy Advances to chat, trade Pokémon, and participate in battles. Other new features include a tutorial mode, a recap system, minigames, and more.Cheat: DiplomaTo get the diploma, catch all 386 pokemon (i.e. fill the national dex).Cheat: DiplomaOnce you have beaten the Elite 4 and have more then 60 pokemon in the pokedex, go to Pallet Town and see the Professor.
